TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorFormat extends System.ValueType implements class System.IComparable`1<valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ColorFormat>

Docs.summary: Defines the ColorFormat component of a GraphicsMode.

remarks.para: A ColorFormat contains Red, Green, Blue and Alpha components that descibe the allocated bits per pixel for the corresponding color.
